item.title: Elon Musk’s Boring Company to build Tesla tunnels under Nashville
item.description: Construction could start fast -- but that speed has edangered Boring Company workers in the past.

item.title: Jack Dorsey’s Bluetooth messaging app Bitchat now on App Store
item.description: Jack Dorsey's Bitchat is now available on the App Store, but security researchers have questioned the app's privacy claims.

item.title: A Secretive US Space Plane Will Soon Test Quantum Navigation Technology
item.description: The space plane’s test flight will advance development of a new navigation technology based on electromagnetic wave interference.
